common.email-invalid: A valid email consists of characters, '@' and '.'.
common.email-must-be-string: A valid email address must be string.

form.card-description: Enter your email below to login to your account.
form.user-doesnt-exist: User with given email doesn't exist. Did you mean to create a new account instead?

magic-link.alert-description: Remember to check your spam folder.
magic-link.card-description: We've sent a secure login link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to access your account.
magic-link.countdown-message_one: Once you click the link, <1>please close this tab</1>. If you haven't received the email within {{count}} second, you may request another link.
magic-link.countdown-message_other: Once you click the link, <1>please close this tab</1>. If you haven't received the email within {{count}} seconds, you may request another link.
magic-link.countdown-message_zero: Once you click the link, <1>please close this tab</1>. If you haven't received the email, you may request another login link now.
magic-link.resend-success: A new login link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.

form.card-description: Create your account to get started.
form.terms-and-privacy: By creating an account, you agree to our <1>Terms of Service</1> and <2>Privacy Policy</2>.
form.user-already-exists: User with given email already exists. Did you mean to log in instead?

magic-link.alert-description: Remember to check your spam folder.
magic-link.card-description: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to complete your registration.
magic-link.countdown-message_one: Once you click the link, <1>please close this tab</1>. If you haven't received the email within {{count}} second, you may request another verification link.
magic-link.countdown-message_other: Once you click the link, <1>please close this tab</1>. If you haven't received the email within {{count}} seconds, you may request another verification link.
magic-link.countdown-message_zero: Once you click the link, <1>please close this tab</1>. If you haven't received the email, you may request another verification link now.
magic-link.resend-success: A new verification link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.
